title: Econ., political liberalization in Russia, Mexico

content.question:
Mexico and Russia have each experienced economic liberalization and political liberalization. 

Define economic liberalization and define political liberalization. 

Describe one economic liberalization policy pursued in Mexico since 1985 and one economic liberalization policy pursued in Russia since 1991. 

Describe one political liberalization policy undertaken in Mexico since 1985 and one political  liberalization policy undertaken in Russia since 1991. 

Compare one consequence of economic liberalization on social class in Mexico with one consequence  of economic liberalization on social class in Russia.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
